page.title: 20Children's Leisure Pursuits.
page.content: A survey of the 10/11 year old children in Class 3 at the school showed that they enjoyed the following activities at home: {Riding bicycles-}some have motorbikes which they ride in fields. {Ponies.}Several children had ponies and spent a lot of their freetime with them. {Computers and Electronic Games }are now very popular.It seemed that some get put away and not used very much. {T.V. and Pop Music }are popular with all the children. Perhaps too much so! {Playtime. }At school the children play made-up games such as {gang and chain {tick}and {Last up the top,}which is a varation on British Bulldog. {CREDITS. }All the work in this section was produced by the Headteacher and the children of Class 3 at Leintwardine Primary School,July 1985.
